docs.lead_paragraph: Brunei on Thursday embraced a form of Islamic Shariah criminal law that includes harsh penalties, a move slammed by international rights group as a step backward for human rights.
docs.snippet: Brunei on Thursday embraced a form of Islamic Shariah criminal law that includes harsh penalties, a move slammed by international rights group as a step backward for human rights.

docs.lead_paragraph: Reckitt Benckiser Group said on Wednesday it was no longer in active talks with Merck & Co about buying its consumer health business, leaving Germany's Bayer as a leading contender for the $14 billion (8.2 billion pounds) business.

headline.main: Reckitt Benckiser Says No Longer in Talks With Merck
headline.print_headline: Reckitt Benckiser Says No Longer in Talks With Merck

docs.snippet: Reckitt Benckiser Group said on Wednesday it was no longer in active talks with Merck & Co about buying its consumer health business, leaving Germany's Bayer as a leading contender for the $14 billion (8.2 billion pounds) business.

docs.lead_paragraph: The bill will allow women to be charged with assault if they abuse narcotics while pregnant and give birth to a child who is dependent on drugs or has been harmed by them.

headline.main: Tennessee: Governor Signs Bill Targeting Drug Use During Pregnancy
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Governor Signs Bill Targeting Drug Use in Pregnancy

docs.abstract: Tennessee Gov Bill Haslam signs legislation that will allow women to be charged with assault if they abuse narcotics while pregnant and give birth to a child who is dependent on drugs or harmed.
docs.snippet: The bill will allow women to be charged with assault if they abuse narcotics while pregnant and give birth to a child who is dependent on drugs or has been harmed by them.

docs.lead_paragraph: A killer whale at SeaWorld is pregnant, the San Diego theme park said Tuesday, a development welcomed by the company but decried by animal rights activists trying to outlaw the breeding of captive orcas and "Shamu" shows that feature them doing tricks.

headline.main: SeaWorld Says San Diego Killer Whale Is Pregnant
headline.print_headline: SeaWorld Says San Diego Killer Whale Is Pregnant

docs.snippet: A killer whale at SeaWorld is pregnant, the San Diego theme park said Tuesday, a development welcomed by the company but decried by animal rights activists trying to outlaw the breeding of captive orcas and "Shamu" shows that feature them doing...

docs.lead_paragraph: The sultanate of Brunei this week becomes the first East Asian country to introduce Islamic criminal law, the latest example of a deepening religious conservatism that has also taken root in parts of neighboring Malaysia and Indonesia.

headline.main: Brunei Adopts Sharia Law, Others in Region Consider It
headline.print_headline: Brunei Adopts Sharia Law, Others in Region Consider It

docs.snippet: The sultanate of Brunei this week becomes the first East Asian country to introduce Islamic criminal law, the latest example of a deepening religious conservatism that has also taken root in parts of neighboring Malaysia and Indonesia.

docs.lead_paragraph: As a nine-month deadline for an Israeli-Palestinian peace deal passes, new punitive measures in progress and other moves could bring an intractable conflict to a new low.

headline.main: Arc of a Failed Deal: How Nine Months of Mideast Talks Ended in Disarray
headline.print_headline: Arc of a Failed Deal: How Nine Months of Mideast Talks Ended in Disarray

docs.abstract: Latest round in stalled Israeli-Palestinian peace talks prove perennial truth that United States cannot force an agreement if the two parties are unwilling; as deadline for final-status agreement passes, Israeli and Palestinian leaders are preparing battery of punitive measures and unilateral steps that could bring the conflict to a new low.
docs.snippet: As a nine-month deadline for an Israeli-Palestinian peace deal passes, new punitive measures in progress and other moves could bring an intractable conflict to a new low.

byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon contributed reporting from Washington.
byline.original: By JODI RUDOREN and ISABEL KERSHNER
